string.value: I arrived at the majestic temple high above the sky, the Temple of Time. A fussy looking #b#p2140000##k standing in front of the three doors begins to talk to me...

#p2140000# said there was an incident recently where an intruder broke in through the Door to the Past and that until the case is resolved, they will not be letting regular visitors inside the Temple of Time. He says if I really want to go in, I can, but it will be a waste of time... Well, should I just #bgo in for now#k?

#p2140000# said because time goes backwards in Memory Lane, you can't go forward unless you are given permission. He says I would need to get permission from the Goddess... How do I get permission from the Goddess?
May the blessing of the Goddess be with you. Welcome to the Temple of Time. Unfortunately, we are not accepting regular visitors at this time. Why? Look at the door over there.
Not too long ago, some #rintruder#k destroyed the #bDoor to the Past#k and broke into the temple. Until we solve this case, we are not opening the temple to the public.
If you still insist on entering after everything I've told you, go ahead...
You're just wasting your time. It's impossible to walk down the Path to the Past.
You've made the right decision. The Goddess is currently sleeping anyway, so just wish her a good night sleep and go back.
Time goes backwards in the Path to the Past. Even if you try going forward, you'll keep coming back to where you started. If you want to go forward, you must receive permission from the Goddess.
